JOB DESCRIPTION: Roles and ResponsibilitiesMandatory Skills - 1) .net C# - Experience in Application, Web API, Web Service development.2) PostgreSQL/Oracle – Experience in writing complex SQL.3) Preferable if have,4) Experience in Toll Automation/Traffic management domain.5) Experience in SQL/PLSQL development.Desirable Skills/Job Description - 1) Responsible for developing Windows/Web application, services and other components as per given specifications.2) Backend script writing using SQL/PLSQL.3) Unit level testing of developed code.4) Bug fixing and performance fine tuning in already developed and implemented code.5) Core development experience in .net C# technology for at least 2 year.
